Text:
What took so long...
Thank you very much from a Canadian in Colombia

What took soo long isn't a very nice comment, do you think its your right to get these shows sooner? If I went to all the trouble to convert and upload this I would be annoyed at you for saying that, who do you think you are?
Calm down brigzy, this episode was released a day or so after when it usually is released; He was probably just anticipating it coming sooner.
